#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
#include<cstdlib>
using namespace std;
int Convert_to_Next_Pallindrome(int n)
{
    char a[6],b[6];
    int i=0,t=++n;
    while(1)
    {
        while(t)
        {
            a[i++]=t%10-'0';
            t/=10;
        }
        a[i]='\0';
        i=0;
        int l=strlen(a);
        for(i=0;i<l;i++)
        {
              if(a[i]!=a[--l]){
                 i=0;
                 break;
              }
        }

        if(i==0)
        {
            ++n;
            t=n;
            a[0]=b[0]='\0';
        }
        else
            break;
    }
    return n;
}
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin >> t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int n;
        scanf("%d",&n);
        cout << Convert_to_Next_Pallindrome(n)<<"\n";

    }
    return 0;
}
